00009 /* FSUIPC Offset Accessor.
00010  * Can read from and write to a FSUIPC offset with
00011  * an update time rate (threaded and thread safe).
00012  */
00013 
00014 #ifndef _COFFSETACCESSOR_H_
00015 #define _COFFSETACCESSOR_H_
00016 
00017 #include <exception>
00018 
00019 #include <windows.h>
00020 
00021 #include "CConnector.h"
00022 #include "CAbstractOffsetData.h"
00023 
00024 #ifdef DEBUG
00025 #include <iostream>
00026 #endif
00027 
00039 template<typename T, DWORD dwOffset>
00040 class COffsetAccessor: public CAbstractOffsetData {
00041 
00042           T m_lastFetchedData;
00043           float m_fMultiple;
00044 
00045 public:
00046 
00054           COffsetAccessor(float = 1.0f);
00055 
00064           T getValue() const;
00075           void setValue(const T&);
00082           void update();
00092           bool dataHasChanged() const;
00098           DWORD sizeInBytes() const;
00109           DWORD fillAsRawData(BYTE*) const;
00118           void setValueFromRawData(const BYTE*);
00119 
00120 };
00121 
00122 /* Offset accessor implementation. */
00123 
00124 template<typename T, DWORD dwOffset>
00125 COffsetAccessor<T, dwOffset>::COffsetAccessor(float fMultiple)
00126 : m_fMultiple(fMultiple) { 
00127           if(!CConnector::getInstance()->isOpened()) {
00128                     throw std::exception("Error while instantiating offset accessor: "
00129                                                                        "connector not opened.");
00130           }
00131           m_lastFetchedData = getValue();
00132 }
00133 
00134 template<typename T, DWORD dwOffset>
00135 T COffsetAccessor<T, dwOffset>::getValue() const {
00136     T v;
00137           CConnector::getInstance()->read<T>(dwOffset, &v);
00138 
00139           v = static_cast<T>(v / m_fMultiple);
00140 
00141 #ifdef DEBUG
00142           std::cout << "Value got from offset " << dwOffset << " : "
00143                     << v << std::endl;
00144 #endif
00145 
00146     return v;
00147 }
00148 
00149 template<typename T, DWORD dwOffset>
00150 void COffsetAccessor<T, dwOffset>::setValue(const T& newValue) {
00151           T v = newValue * m_fMultiple;
00152           CConnector::getInstance()->write<T>(dwOffset, &v);
00153 
00154 #ifdef DEBUG
00155           std::cout << "Value set to offset " << dwOffset << " : "
00156                     << v << std::endl;
00157 #endif
00158 
00159           update();
00160 }
00161 
00162 template<typename T, DWORD dwOffset>
00163 void COffsetAccessor<T, dwOffset>::update() {
00164           m_lastFetchedData = getValue();
00165 
00166 #ifdef DEBUG
00167           std::cout << "Value of offset " << dwOffset << " updated to "
00168                     << m_lastFetchedData << std::endl;
00169 #endif
00170 }
00171 
00172 template<typename T, DWORD dwOffset>
00173 DWORD COffsetAccessor<T, dwOffset>::sizeInBytes() const {
00174           return sizeof(T);
00175 }
00176 
00177 template<typename T, DWORD dwOffset>
00178 bool COffsetAccessor<T, dwOffset>::dataHasChanged() const {
00179           return (getValue() != m_lastFetchedData);
00180 }
00181 
00182 template<typename T, DWORD dwOffset>
00183 DWORD COffsetAccessor<T, dwOffset>::fillAsRawData(BYTE* buffer) const {
00184           DWORD length = sizeInBytes();
00185 
00186 #ifdef DEBUG
00187           std::cout << "Fill buffer with value 0x" << std::hex
00188                     << m_lastFetchedData << " for offset 0x" << std::hex 
00189                     << dwOffset << std::endl;
00190 #endif
00191 
00192           memcpy(buffer, &m_lastFetchedData, length);
00193 
00194           return length;
00195 }
00196 
00197 template<typename T, DWORD dwOffset>
00198 void COffsetAccessor<T, dwOffset>::setValueFromRawData(const BYTE* buffer) {
00199           T newValue;
00200           memcpy(&newValue, buffer, sizeInBytes());
00201 
00202 #ifdef DEBUG
00203           std::cout << "Set offset 0x" << std::hex << dwOffset 
00204                     << " from raw data " << newValue << std::endl;
00205 #endif
00206 
00207           setValue(newValue);
00208 }
00209 
00210 #endif
